name: OpenMageModuleFostering/Conversionbug_Quickreorder
description:
Replenish Products

For the products which need to be replenished after a certain interval of time, this extension can prove to be really helpful for boosting their sales. The replenish products extension keeps a track of the products bought by the customer and after a certain interval (as decided and entered in advance by the admin), the extension sends the customers a reminder email for buying back the products before it gets over. The replenish products extension is beneficial in the following ways:
